/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban landscape. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. Power lines crisscross above, connecting the buildings and adding a touch of modernity to the scene. The street itself is lined with trees, their green leaves contrasting with the concrete structures. Cars and buses are scattered along the road, hinting at the city's constant movement and energy. The image is bathed in the soft light of day, highlighting the colors and details of the scene.
